Command Line Options
====================

These flags allow you to change the behavior of `Crawler`. Check out how to use them in `Cookbook`_


.. option:: -i <regex>, --ignore <regex>
	
	Ignore pages that match a specific pattern

.. option:: -d <sec>, --delay <sec>

	Use a delay in between page fetch so we don't overwhelm the remote server. Value in seconds.

	Default: 1 second
